ideas.gettingStartedText: New to Scratch? Try the Getting Started tutorial.
ideas.activityGuidesText: What do you want to make with Scratch? For each activity, you can try the Tutorial, download a set of Coding Cards, or view the Educator Guide.
ideas.animateANameDescription: Animate the letters of your name, initials, or favorite word.
ideas.animateACharacterDescription: Bring characters to life with animation.
ideas.makeMusicDescription: Khetha ithuluzi, faka umsindo bese ucindezela izikinobho ukudlala umsindo
ideas.createAStoryDescription: Khetha abalingisi, faka ingxoxo, bese wenza indaba yakho iphile
ideas.chaseGameDescription: Make a game where you chase a character to score points.
ideas.videoSensingDescription: Interact with a project using the Video Sensing extension.
ideas.cardsTitle: Get the Entire Collection of Coding Cards
ideas.cardsText: With the Scratch Coding Cards, you can learn to create interactive games, stories, music, animations, and more!
ideas.starterProjectsText: You can play with Starter Projects and remix them to make your own creations.
ideas.desktopEditorBody: To create projects without an Internet connection, you can download the Scratch app.
ideas.questionsBody: Uma unemibuzo ? buka iimibuzo ejwayele ukubuzwanoma uvakasheleukubuza ngeforum yeScript yemibhalo.
ideas.MakeItFlyDescription: Choose any character and make it fly!
ideas.RaceDescription: Yenza umdlalo lapho abalingiswa ababili begijimisana
ideas.HideAndSeekDescription: Yenza umdlalo wokucasha noma ufune onabalingisi abavela babuye banyamalale
ideas.FashionDescription: Yenza umdlalo lapho ugqokisa umlingisi izingubo ezahlukene nezitayela ezahlukeke
ideas.PongDescription: Yenza umdlalo webhola elibhambayo elinomsindo, amaphuzu kanye neminye imithelela
ideas.ImagineDescription: Imagine a world where anything is possible.
ideas.DanceDescription: Qamba inkundla yomdanso wopopayi unomcula kanye kanye neminyakazo yokudansa
ideas.CatchDescription: Yenza umdlalo lapho ungabamba khona izinto eziwa zivela esibhakabhakeni
ideas.VirtualPetDescription: Yenza isilwane esifuyiwe sidle, siphuze futhi sidlale
